name: brink-smacss
description: smacss implementation by brink technology co.

scripts.kss: sass vars/index.sass dist/index.css && kss-node -t ./kss/styleguide-template/ --css ../index.css --source . --homepage kss/styleguide.md --destination dist/styleguide
scripts.kss:watch: watch 'npm run kss' base color helpers kss layout module state tests vars

author: Derek Moore (repos@findthebrink.com)
